#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    long int t;
    cin>>t;
    char a[25],b[25];
    for(long int i=0;i<t;i++){
        cin>>a>>b;
        int c[123]={0};
        for(int j=0;a[j]!='\0';j++){
            c[a[j]]++;
        }
        int cnt=0;
        for(int j=0;b[j]!='\0';j++){
            c[b[j]]--;
            if(c[b[j]]<0){
                cnt++;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(cnt==1)
        cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
}
